articles.content: The Emmys returned tonight (September 12) with a three-hour ceremony at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. While the winners’ list was generally very impressive, there were also a few snubs along … [+3439 chars]

articles.title: PnB Rock shot dead at Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles restaurant - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 30-year-old rapper, whose real name is Rakim Allen, was geo-tagged in a social media post by his girlfriend, which was subsequently deleted from Instagram.
articles.content:
PnB Rock was shot to death Monday during a robbery at a Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles in South Los Angeles, police said.
